Instruction: Season chicken breast with salt, black pepper, and cumin.
Grill chicken over medium-high heat for 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through. Let rest for a few minutes, then slice thinly.
Rinse and drain black beans and corn kernels. Halve cherry tomatoes. Dice red onion. Chop cilantro. Peel and dice avocado.
Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large salad bowl.
Add sliced chicken, black beans, corn kernels, cherry tomatoes, red onion, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro to the bowl.
Squeeze lime juice over the salad and toss until well combined.
